<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3352</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Sound of Comparative Literature in Diverse Languages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Ton von Literaturwissenschaften in den 
verschiedenen Sprachen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le bruit de la littérature comparative dans des 
langages divers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O som da literatura comparativa em línguas 
diversas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il suono di letteratura comparativa nei linguaggi 
vari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ήχος της συγκριτικής λογοτεχνίας στις διαφορετικές 
γλώσσες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El sonido de la literatura comparativa en 
lenguajes diversos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this article,which appears in the ETNI magazine RAG, the writer presents her feelings and thoughts on how Literature cannot be separated from language, history and culture, and how she applied this in her classroom</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">culture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">foreign language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem Artikel der im ETNI Zeitschrift LAPPEN 
erscheint, stellt der Verfasser ihr Gefühle und Gedanken auf dar, wie
Literatur nicht von der Sprache, von der Geschichte und von der Kultur
getrennt werden kann und wie sie dieses in ihrem Klassenzimmer 
anwendete</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En cet article, qui paraît dans le CHIFFON de 
magazine d'ETNI, l'auteur lui présente des sentiments et des pensées
sur la façon dont la littérature ne peut pas être séparée du 
langage, de l'histoire et de la culture, et la façon dont elle a 
appliqué ceci dans sa salle de classe</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste artigo, que se publica no PANO do 
compartimento de ETNI, o escritor apresenta-lhe sentimentos e 
pensamentos em como a literatura não pode ser separada da língua, do
history e da cultura, e em como aplicou esta em sua sala de aula</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questo articolo, che è publicato nel PANNO 
dello scomparto di ETNI, il produttore gli presenta le sensibilità ed
i pensieri su come la letteratura non può essere separata dal 
linguaggio, dalla storia e dalla coltura e su come ha applicato questa
nella sua aula</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το άρθρο, που εμφανίζεται στο ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ 
περιοδικών ETNI, ο συγγραφέας παρουσιάζει τα συναισθήματα και 
τις σκέψεις της τον τρόπο με τον οποίο η λογοτεχνία δεν μπορεί να
χωριστεί από τη γλώσσα, την ιστορία και τον πολιτισμό, και στον 
τρόπο με τον οποίο εφάρμοσε αυτό στην τάξη της</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este artículo, que aparece en el TRAPO del 
compartimiento de ETNI, el programa de escritura le presenta 
sensaciones y pensamientos en cómo la literatura no se puede separar 
de lenguaje, de historia y de cultura, y cómo ella aplicó esto en su
sala de clase</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kultur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fremdsprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">culture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langue étrangère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cultura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua extrangeira</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">coltura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lingua straniera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πολιτισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ξένη γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cultura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">idioma extranjero</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
